menuCategories.name: Dinner
menuCategories.description: Elegant evening meals for special occasions
menuCategories.pricingNote: Prices are based on Buffet Style. There is an additional charge for Plated Service or disposable dishes. Prices subject to change without notice.

items.name: Ham with Warm Pineapple Sauce
items.description: Side dishes may include: Dinner Rolls, Creamy scalloped or cheesy potatoes, Choice of Veggie and Salad, Cake Buffet

items.name: Roasted Pork Loin
items.description: Side dishes may include: Dinner Rolls, Choice of rice or potato, Apple sauce, Choice of Veggie, Choice of Salad, Choice of Dessert

items.name: Chicken or Beef Enchiladas
items.description: Side dishes may include: Choice of Potato or Rice, Nachos with layered Dip, Choice of salad, Ice cream with warm caramel or chocolate sauce and a cinnamon wedge

items.name: Tuscan Chicken
items.description: Stuffed with sundried tomatoes, spinach and provolone cheese and then baked in a creamy italian sauce. Side dishes may include: Choice of bread, Choice of veggie, Choice of salad, Choice of rice or potato, Sticky toffee pudding or cinnabun bread pudding with sweet cream sauce

items.name: Cowboy Feast - Beef on a Bun
items.description: Side dishes may include: Beef on a bun - pulled or sliced in an au jus horseradish, Baked Beans, Baked Potatoes with sour cream, chives and real bacon bits, Corn, Choice of Salad, Kim's Warm Apple Crisp with Ice cream

items.name: Lasagna
items.description: Side dishes may include: Choice of Homemade Buns or Garlic Bread, Choice of 2 Salads, Whipped Cheesecake with raspberry or blueberry toppings

items.name: Barb-B-Que Chicken Breast Or Herb Crusted Parmesan Chicken
items.description: Side dishes may include: Homemade buns or rolls, Oven roasted potatoes, Seasonal veggies, Choice or Salad, Ice cream with warm Callebaut chocolate sauce and homemade cinnamon buns and butter horns

items.name: Roast Beef - Seasoned Inside Round Roast
items.description: Side dishes may include: Buns or rolls, Mashed Potatoes and Gravy, Baby Carrots with butter and dill, Creamy Horseradish sauce, Choice of salad, Homemade tarts, squares, and cookies (more than 15 varieties to choose from)

items.name: Stuffed Chicken Breasts or Chicken Cordon Bleu
items.description: Side dishes may include: Choice of salad and buns, Homemade cranberry sauce, Scalloped Potatoes or roasted baby potatoes, Steamed broccoli with cheese sauce, Frozen Strawberry and Lemon Freeze

items.name: Turkey with all the trimmings
items.description: Side dishes may include: Buns or rolls, Sweet maple yams, Choice of salad, Creamy Mashed potatoes and gravy, Homemade stuffing and cranberries, Green beans with mushroom sauce or Peas in a white sauce, Choice of pies - chocolate custard, banana cream, double-decker key lime, apple, bumble berry pie, blueberry, pumpkin, coconut, peach and flapper

items.name: Appetizer Party
items.description: Variety of appetizers and finger foods
items.price: $18-$30 per person (depending on # of people and # of choices)
